data.caption: Operation tanlines 2019 starts today! First time in shorts and jersey since the summer = me veeeerry happy... Also starting to feel like some sort of bike rider again after all that time off the bike and feeling uncomfortable on the bike... Let the spring begin!

The climb to Sant Martí Sacalm! According to legends this used to be a flat road, the hill is actually an 800m pile of masochistic cyclists coming to die here... I just finished a 20 min ftp test while making the video, that's why I'm riding like a zombie ☠️ 🧟‍♂️ #fromwhereiride #theseroads #ftptest #nopainnogain #training #cycling

Trying a longer ride today, forgot to factor in the early sunsets that are still going on these days so ended up with a bit of a tt home, luckily I brought a gel because I'm still at the 2h bonk stage in my current fitness! #cycling #training #roadslikethese #fromwhereiride #costabrava
Classic girona cycling shot! Good day to ride a bike, rides getting slightly longer though today's 2h15 was on the limit #gironacycling #bluesky #training #roadslikethese #wintermilessummersmiles
New year, new desk, clean as F! just how I like it 😍
Have I ever mentioned I won the @mallorca312 this year? #2018bestnine

New website! Link in bio (where else?)

Finishing the last bit of road up to mdddm (Mare de Déu del Mont) together with @anniemcbain. Epic views, blue skies, wonderful company, tasty bocs, medieval towns and bridges... Perfect day to finish off one of the best weeks I've had in this place! 📷 @jodydwilson #gironaenamora

One of those typical Girona Wednesdays... Going for the all in banyoles package with this cool bunch of people: little warm-up, #smashfest op rocacorba, coffee ☕ by the lake and stopping by the @haribo_es factory 🏭 on the way home #cycling #gironacycling #dayslikethese #gironaenamora #backlanes
Hey guys, has anyone ever taken a photo of this coastal road on the Costa Brava? Wasn't sure so here is one... 😘 #coastroad #costabrava #cycling #roadslikethese #roadporn ##gironacycling
Only in girona #firesdegirona #correfoc #gironaliving #firesdesantnarcis

After almost 10 months on this desk I've got the set-up pretty dialed in 🛠 left to right: a cactus🌵 - stuff that's normally in my pockets, with my phone (in use for taking this picture) face down and notifications disabled (usually) - a nice set of wireless @sennheiser headphones 🎧 to help me stay focused - (under the screen) a mac mini that recently got an extra flash drive upgrade, the original 'regular' drive is now beeing used for backups (they're both internal so I guess I can put the external drive at the back away 🤔) - (on the computer) coins for the coffee vending machine - a screen with my new website in progress (code left, preview right) - a keyboard and mouse to finish it off. Apart from the bunch of cables I try to keep it as clutter free as possible keep distractions at bay.

disclaimer: philosophical rant with “wisdom quotes” and life metaphors incoming. TL;DR: it’s my birthday and I’m happy!
• • •
Exactly one year ago I rode this same climb (I’ve done it only once since). I remember realising that specific day I was very pleased with the life I had and choices I made for myself. I could’ve never guessed what would happen the next 365 days. A year that started with a low and an uncertain future. But as they say: — 🧀 quote incoming — "what doesn’t kill you makes you stronger”. It was a year of starting over and trying to leave what had happened behind. Cycling helps me channel bad feelings and frustration into something positive or improve the good feelings I have. (have I mentioned I won the @mallorca312 ?)
• • •
This morning I set out with the plan of climbing to the top of Rocacorba to take a picture for this post. While cycling in the area around Girona you can always see the top characterised by two antennas. Today it was covered in a dark wet looking cloud, antennas hidden in plain sight. Nevertheless I kept riding towards my goal for the day. As I got to the top, sure enough the sky had cleared! I guess I was lucky? But I could’ve also skipped the climb and turned back home after not seeing any improvements. I set out with a goal and got where I wanted to be. Getting to the top of this climb of course doesn’t mean the end. There’s a bunch of other climbs to conquer, sometimes the views won’t be as good, other times they’ll be better. I believe today I’m in better place than I was last year and I can’t wait to see the view at the top next year. (how’s that for a metaphor?)
• • •
Thanks everyone for the last 365 days, y’all know who you are 😉. Special mentions go to a few special people without whom I wouldn’t be where I am today. Dave and @pixiesas who took me into the @bikebreaks family. I’m still living in Girona thanks to them, I’m not the first and certainly not the last person who has experienced their generosity! Last but not least my parents @paul.coertjens & @ingrid.allaerts making me who I am and helping me get through my adventures. Happy mom&dad'versary.
• • •

Yes! A super flat race in a windy part of Catalunya, Belgian racing experience might come in handy 🤔 lap 1: split the bunch 🚲 lap 2: split the front group 🛵 lap 3: go solo with 20km to go 🏍 get aero as fuck, push hard and bam, win the race! Thanks to teammate @tristantakephoto for helping me in the break! #bikeracing #cycling #crosswinds #aeroiseverything #teamtanlines

Spring clouds, green grass with poppy's and rocacorba in the background 😍 trying to do a recovery ride on the road bike 🚲 after a tt session 🛵💨 #gironacycling #cyclinglife #girona #cataluny #theseroads #fromwhereiride

Summer is coming!

Getting ready for @mallorca312 meant getting to the start line fresh and rested, a proper massage the day before to loosen up the muscles is a vital part in that! Luckily @desportmasseur was also in Mallorca to do just that! 👌 Too bad he doesn't live in Girona 😅
📷 Taken last year, but the tan lines are still the same...

Taking out my @mallorca312 jersey in between rain clouds... Even on a rainy day it can get sunny! #girona #cycling #cyclinglife #sunsoutgunsout #gftbe #selfiesarehard
Tonight I took the time to write down a report of the @mallorca312 race from my point of view... Link in bio, where else?

Just one of those days where everything falls into place... It's all still a bit unreal, but I'm starting to realise how I won on Saturday is quite something. It might look like a gutsy move, going solo 52km into a 312km race, but it was actually more a move of uncertainty and doubt. I felt like I wouldn't be able to respond to attacks from my competitors, so I wanted to anticipate. I probably would have blown myself trying to answer attacks and sudden changes in pace, but if there's one thing I can do it's putting out some consistent power over a long time, and that seems to have done the trick, I just needed that bit of luck that made my competition decide not to get onto my wheel straight away 💪 Thanks everyone for the messages 🙏 see you next year @mallorca312 #cycling #racing #bikeracing
@granfondoteam.be spirit! #gftbe

Yes! Finally a proper result in a gran fondo! Winning @mallorca312 with a 260km solo 😵 might wake up tomorrow morning and realise it was all a dream 😴 thanks to @granfondoteam.be for the support @bikebreaks for letting me off the hook during the busiest weekend of the year (although they didn't really have a choice) @mallorca312 for the excellent organisation of this race... Time to put away the phone and finish this beer!

Scary cloud above my head today 😱 let's hope it's not a sign

These are the colors around Girona at the moment, lots of fields with bright yellow flowers and blue skies 😍 (not in the picture, the still snowy white peaks of the Pyrénées) also, it was about 25 degrees today 😎 #gironacycling #girona #gironaliving #colors #outsideisfree #springisintheair #summeriscoming

Today, after about 2h30 of riding (not very slow) I decided to make a little detour, halfway the detour I missed a turn and decided to make another detour... That's how I got close to the "valter2000" climb (2100m) "might as well go up since I'm here" I thought by myself... About 3,5km from the top, there was too much snow to continue and I turned back (that was the 1st smart decision of the day) ended up with 215km at an avg speed of 30kph 🤯 think I'll sleep quite well tonight... #longstorylong #tldr #cycling #training #smashfest #theseroads #roadslikethese #fromwhereiride #catalunyacycling

About this weekend: yesterday 11th after 50km in a break of 7 joined by another 10 riders 20km from the, video 📹 taken while forming the break, felt strong with my 6 companions but put too much energy in the initial break to get out a good result against the more fresh guys coming from the back. Today I clearly wasn't recovered from yesterday and felt an ongoing injury coming up, so in the spirit of #gohardorgohome I went home after doing a few hours of training #cycling #bikeracing #catalunyacycling #hurtlocker #teamtanlines

Yesterday I stumbled upon a part of the "via verde" from Llagostera to the coast 🏖 I always knew it was there, just never took it... I'll be back for sure! 😍 #cycling #training #cyclinglife #cyclingshots #fromwhereiride #roadslikethese #groadslikethese #lifebehindbars #viaverde #catalunyacycling

Looking back... I usually try to avoid it, but today is a special occasion! 🎉 (tl:dr I like girona) Exactly 6 months ago I arrived in Girona after deciding I wanted to call this city home. Safe to say I made the right choice! 👌 Discovering the city, meeting a bunch of awesome people. Loads of bike riding on awesome roads, and discovering beautiful new roads every day! 😍 kicking off the Catalan racing season with some nice results 🥉🥈🥇and the way things are going now it looks like it's only going to get better! 📸 by @arnauwens #longpost #SorryNotSorry #dropthemic #peaceout #gironaliving #gironalife #cyclinglife #lovelife #goodtimesahead
Riding the bike as usual, Girona and Barcelona united for some race course recon #cycling #bikeracing #reconday #theseroads #fromwhereiride #cyclinglife

This is what bike racing in Catalunya looks like 😍 2 days after I can still feel the race in my legs 😅 safe to say it did take some effort to get us the 1-2 we were (not so) quietly hoping for. 3 days of course recon on roads close to home and talking tactics with the team (@tristantakephoto and me) definitely helped! Race report in link in bio 👆 Looking forward to the races to come, they will be harder and longer, just the way we like them! 🙃 thanks for the 📷's @arnauwens @menno.bottema #cycling #racing #bikeracing #teamtanlines @theservicecourse #catalunyacycling #theseroads #fromwhereweride

@theservicecourse #teamtanlines taking home all the trophies today 🥇 bullseye this week for @tristantakephoto after a 3rd and a 2nd spot last 2 races... 🥈 2nd place for me after some perfectly executed team tactics 😎 #cycling #racing #bikeracing #strongmotherfuckers #smartmotherfuckers #catalunyaracing

Tried to make a selection of all the shots taken on this awesome day! Cloudy, wet and cold at at 1500m but so worth it along the coast road! Might not have been the best riding weather, but we got lucky up high and the clouds make these landscapes so much more beautiful and dramatic... Last full day on GC, Thanks for the ride @constantinbartels #cycling #cyclinglife #bigdayout #grancanariacycling #westcoastroad #clouds #dramatic #epic #rawbeauty #nature #gftbe @granfondoteam.be

GC is still recovering from the fires a few months back, but new green is showing itself everywhere. It's always nice to come to the northern part of the island, with Tenerife in the background! #cycling #training #grancanaria #grancanariacycling #theseroads #fromwhereiride

About today; did a little race up a mountain... 21km, 1600m elevation, pitches up to 23%, a mere 5 seconds off the course record which I took last year 😭 this year we did the "easy" first 5km about 25 seconds slower than last year... Next year I need a lead-out! Check Strava for more stats! Given all the places I've been the last few months I can't really say I've missed gran canaria, but it's definitely nice to be back. As a tourist instead of for work this time! #cycling #training #fromwhereiride #theseroads
